basics.name: Christopher Lee
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: From as far as I can remember I have always had a passion to design and create. This passion has guided me to first pursue a graphic design degree which eventually introduced me to Web Development. Web Development was my first entry into programming and even though I used computers to play many video games, how computers worked were a complete mystery to me. When I was first able to print out

in my web browser my eyes lite up in fascination, suddenly I could start to see some semblance of how computers worked. From that time my interest was piqued, I re-enrolled in school and got a second major in Computer Science. Currently I am working as a Software Engineer developing UIs and Web Applications for Praxis Inc.

highlights: Designed, developed, and operationalized a distributed maritime surveillance software that provided a user-interface, real time data distribution, and low-level interface for an airplane mounted radar, which is currently deployed on three aircrafts and operating across 15 South Pacific island countries as part of a $64 million program.

Developed mission planning software to enable users to efficiently plan observation sequences for a scientific instrument(Wide-Field Imager) on NASA's $1.5 billion Parker Solar Probe satellite. Mission planning software reduced the amount of time spent planning observation timelines by 80%.

Designed/modernized applications for three operational spacecrafts to improve cybersecurity, usability, and functionality creating a user-centric application for query and analysis of scientific data.
Developed Python scripts to automate log mining, packet analysis, and other analytics to visualize cyber security patterns for executive analysis.

work.company: UH Manoa - Department of Art and Art History
highlights: Managed a departmental technology lab and team of 15 student volunteers, while automated all aspects of system administration for efficiency.
Achieved top performing Genius Bar rating for customer service, satisfaction, and technical excellence.
Help faculty and students with technology needs
Maintenance and service of computers and printers
Setup and maintenance of server equipment
Creation of graphics, both print and web

references.name: Letter of recommendations and references available upon request
